statement.tex: %text For what value of $M$ would the following be true? % \qquad\dfrac{\tan 2x\cdot \tan x}{\tan 2x- \tan x}=\sin Mx

step.context: %text Is the following conversion of $\dfrac{\tan 2x\cdot \tan x}{\tan 2x- \tan x}$ to $\sin$ and $\cos$ functions correct? %
%text Can $(\sin 2x\cdot\cos x- \cos 2x\cdot \sin x)$ be expressed as the following single function? %
%text If $\dfrac{\sin 2x\cdot \sin x}{\sin x}=\sin Mx$, what is M? %
